dict.acceptation: 本质上，根本上；本来；“essential“的派生；

sent.orig: What victory means is not essentially controversial meaning of the common good is essentially controversial.
sent.trans: 何谓胜利，不存在实质性争议，何谓共善却是有实质性争议的。

sent.orig: One is that the former is an essentially deterministic theory and the latter is essentially indeterministic.
sent.trans: 一个就是前者是本质上确定性理论，而后者是本质上不确定。

sent.orig: But they are essentially instruments of state power.
sent.trans: 但他们实质上是国家权力的工具。

sent.orig: Human life and the universe continue to mutate constantly and are thought of as essentially impermanent.
sent.trans: 人生和宇宙生生不息地变迁，被认为是无常之物。

sent.orig: Thinking in categories enables us to categorise phenomena are essentially ambiguous.
sent.trans: 分类思考能够使我们可以将一些本质上含糊的现象进行分类。
